sect2.title: Glibc Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, readelf Coreutils: cat, chmod, cp, cut, date, expr, hostname, install, ln, mknod, mv, mkdir, rm, pwd, sort, touch, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Gzip: gzip Make: make Gawk: gawk Sed: sed Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
